newsitem.title: CHILE: Chile July industrial output up 2.3 pct on yr ago.
newsitem.headline: Chile July industrial output up 2.3 pct on yr ago.

text.p: Chilean industrial production rose 2.3 percent in July compared with the same month last year with sales growing 0.4 percent in the same period, said the National Statistics Institute.

Areas recording greatest production growth included petroleum and coal derivatives, up 50 percent, non-metallic metals, up 27 percent and plastic output, which rose 19 percent on the same month last year.

Falls in output were registered in the rubber industry, down 17 percent, the iron and steel industry, down 14.5 percent and the leather industry, where production slipped 14 percent in July against the same period 1995.
